value:
A warrior of Sacae defends his
own with pride. Plus, there's a
debt I have to repay.

Oh, uh, bows aren't really my thing.
Everyone has different talents, right?

I was never good with the bow and
frankly, I'm terrible at hunting...$k$pBut I have been told I have a good
sword arm!

Does this castle—or maybe this
whole world—have an unusual
number of, er, beautiful people?

I'm Guy, the future best swordsman
in all of Sacae! I'm here to visit from
$Nf's castle!

I will become a great knight one
day! Until that day comes, I will
not return home!

My sword will never lose to foes
like these! Let me show you just
how much I've learned!
Wow... That is not great!

I'm going to get as strong as I can,
and then, back home, I...I will defend
my tribe and mother as best I'm able!

I'm Guy, a warrior of the Kutolah.
We're led by the Silver Wolf, Lord
Dayan himself!

Warriors of the Kutolah are usually
pretty good at riding horses while
using their bows... But not me.$k$pI chose the path of the sword.$k$pEveryone kept telling me how there
are already so many who are skilled
with the sword out in the world...$k$pI knew that, of course. But I didn't
want something like that to stop me
from doing whatever I could.$k$pBesides, I made a promise to my
master...that I would grow strong
enough to beat him...$k$pI'm going to have to get a lot
stronger still...$k$pThat's why I'm still honing my skills
here and now, and will continue to
do so until I'm the best in all Sacae!
たあっ
いける！
うわっ…
何でだよ…
You can't beat me.
This'll do it!
I'll keep getting stronger!
I will defend Sacae!
I will master the sword...
Hehe
I'm Guy, a warrior of the Kutolah. We're led by the Silver Wolf, Lord Dayan himself!
Ah! D-don't scare me like that! It's dangerous to sneak up on a skilled swordsman, you know!
Three years ago, I left my tribe behind and began my training. I decided to master the art of the sword.
A Sacae warrior proudly defends his own.
Master, I said I would challenge you. I will grow stronger. I will beat you.
Mother, I... Hey! Don't listen in to my private thoughts!
I’m traveling and training to grow stronger! I must defend my tribe, my mother, and you as best I can.
Right.
Where to?
Leave it to me!
